original_text: The wicked things that you have done will punish you. You are guilty because you have turned away from me. You have brought terrible trouble on yourselves, because you have turned against me, the Lord your God. Because you no longer respect me, you will realize that you are in great trouble.’ That is what the Lord God Almighty says. The wicked things that you have done will punish you. You are guilty because you have turned away from me. You have brought terrible trouble on yourselves, because you have turned against me, the Lord your God. Because you no longer respect me, you will realize that you are in great trouble.’ That is what the Lord God Almighty says. The wicked things that you have done will punish you. You are guilty because you have turned away from me. You have brought terrible trouble on yourselves, because you have turned against me, the Lord your God. Because you no longer respect me, you will realize that you are in great trouble.’ That is what the Lord God Almighty says. The wicked things that you have done will punish you.
korean_text: 네 악이 너를 징계하겠고 네 반역이 너를 책망할 것이라 그런즉 네 하나님 여호와를 버림과 네 속에 나를 경외함이 없는 것이 악이요 고통인 줄 알라 주 만군의 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: The wicked things that you have done will punish you.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 행한 악한 것들이 너를 벌할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You are guilty because you have turned away from me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나에게서 떠났기 때문에 죄가 있다.

sentences.original_text: You have brought terrible trouble on yourselves,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 스스로 끔찍한 재앙을 불러왔다.

sentences.original_text: because you have turned against me, the Lord your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나 주 너의 하나님을 대적했기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Because you no longer respect me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 더 이상 나를 존경하지 않으므로,

sentences.original_text: you will realize that you are in great trouble.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 큰 곤경에 처했다는 것을 깨닫게 될 것이다.'

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord God Almighty says.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 주전능하신 하나님이 말씀하신 것이다.
